message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.SP, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with compressive sensing (CS) and image reconstruction, which are topics covered in several arXiv CS sub-categories. The use of a simple sensing matrix and the focus on image reconstruction suggest that cs.IT (Information Theory) is the most likely sub-category. However, the paper also discusses wavelet decomposition and its implementation on images, which are topics covered in cs.CV (Computer Vision) and cs.MM (Multimedia). The use of wavelets for sparsity and the comparison with standard wavelets suggest cs.SP (Signal Processing) as another likely sub-category. Finally, the use of a joint framework and the focus on improved reconstruction performance suggest cs.LG (Machine Learning) as a possible sub-category.
